sentences.en: "I wish I did," said Phil Jordan, relapsing into his usual gloom.
sentences.cn: “我要是做了就好了，”菲尔•乔丹说着，回到平时的忧郁中。

sentences.en: A wide range of emotionally stressful events may trigger a relapse.
sentences.cn: 多种令人情绪紧张的事情都可能引起旧病复发.

sentences.en: After convalescence he had a relapse.
sentences.cn: 他于痊愈之后,病又发作了一次.

sentences.en: After making some progress, he suffered a relapse.
sentences.cn: 他的病好了一点, 又复发了.

sentences.en: After several relapse into business absorption, M. Lorry had become Doctor's friend.
sentences.cn: 在多次深入业务关系之后, 劳雷先生已经变为医生的朋友.

sentences.en: But, unfortunately , there has been'-- he paused add took a deep breath --'a slight relapse.'
sentences.cn: 可是不幸的是 —— ” 他住了嘴,深深地吸了一口气, “ 他的病出现了一次轻微的反复. ”

sentences.en: Even in relapse there will be times when the patient's general condition improves.
sentences.cn: 即便在复发期间,病人仍会有好转的时候.

sentences.en: Her large shapely body seemed to relapse naturally into stillness.
sentences.cn: 她的体态动人的高大身子似乎自然而然地陷于静止了.

sentences.en: In 90 per cent of cases the patient will relapse within six months.
sentences.cn: 90%的病人在6个月内会再次发病。

sentences.en: It is by no means clear that the financial markets will not relapse into panic.
sentences.cn: 现在还不能确定金融市场不会重新陷入恐慌。

sentences.en: She had a relapse and died soon after.
sentences.cn: 她旧病复发，不久就去世了。

sentences.en: She stoped to blush and laugh at her own relapse.
sentences.cn: 她停下来,不禁脸红,笑她自己的旧病复发.

sentences.en: Tell me, how does this relapse come about?
sentences.cn: 告诉我, 这种病为什么会犯?

sentences.en: The treatment is usually given to women with a high risk of relapse after surgery.
sentences.cn: 这种治疗方法通常针对术后复发风险高的女性。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, most of them relapse to alcohol abuse.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 他们中的大多数人故态复萌,又纵酒了.

sentences.en: You are well now, but mind you don't have a relapse.
sentences.cn: 你的病虽然好了, 可要防止反复.
